website_summaries.verdict: Delightful retro design with the latest self-winding movement.
pros: Stylish everyday timepiece with day and date function
Unusual rectangular case and see-through caseback
cons: Cannot be hand wound, you need to move to wind the movement

customer_reviews.title: Avoid buying this one!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch and says it's auto-winding, no more batteries. I love the look and the styling of the watch. It won't keep accurate time! I believe the self winding function is not working properly? I hate to return it but I may be forced to. A watch that won't keep accurate time is worthless. I attempted to contact Sieko for warranted support, they want to send it in and the repair costs might be $115.00. Sorry, looks like this one is trash. I just missed the Amazon return window, so no fault for Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Dewayne

customer_reviews.title: Stylish value.
customer_reviews.text: Love it immediately. Especially at this price point. And, the green face! Mad Men cool. Automatic movement. My second RECRAFT Seiko in a month and very happy with both watches. Agree with other review that says it looks even better in real life than in the ad.
customer_reviews.author: paul bert

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, retro inspired watch.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The retro design is very nice. Dial is absolutely gorgeous. Pics do not do this piece justice. Leather strap seems to be of high quality for the price of the watch. Automatic movement definitely suits the watch. Cons: No lume. Watch is all but unreadable at night. Leather strap is a bit stiff at first but I am sure it will break in over time. Summary: For the price, this is a fantastic watch. I really cannot stress enough how gorgeous the dial is on this watch. Whether you are a collector like I am, or just want a decent casual watch to wear to the office, this retro designed watch looks great and will capture notice.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Adams

customer_reviews.title: Seiko Recrafted for Today's Hipsters
customer_reviews.text: Seiko RECRAFT series is a pleasant through back to the 1970s. Measures 39.5mm has a green sunburst colored center disc with a brushed and polished stainless steel case. Powered by Seiko's own in-house movement caliber 7S26 is viewable behind the mineral crystal exhibition case-back. This nice casual, inexpensive, a timepiece that is water resistant to 50 meters. The Brown Calf Leather strap with a pebble textured with matching stitch is solidly constructed. Seiko blends modern and retro with a flare, unlike others at a price that will not break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: D. F. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: A great looking watch!  With all else,  ask me later
customer_reviews.text: It's a fantastic looking watch, perhaps the nicest looking watch I've ever bought. I've had it 2 days now, though, and have little else to comment on. I simply haven't had it long enough. While I highly value customer feedback, asking for feedback, just days after receiving a product I find ill- advised, and recommend this practice be revisited. Wait a month, then solicit comments. I believe it would produce a more valuable picture of your products and a better review for other customers. Joe
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!  EXCELLENT QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this watch as I wanted an automatic, something with a brown leather band, and a watch that would be dressy but also comfortable. This watch is SUPERB! Do not hesitate in purchasing this watch... I thought about it for about 5 days, and I am so glad I purchased it. It is of excellent quality, the movement is very smooth, and the entire value is tremendous. AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Victor Javier Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful green dial
customer_reviews.text: Lovely watch to behold! The dark green dial, paired with the gold indices, is absolutely brilliant. And that brown strap with the textured surface lends so much elegance to the overall effect, A lovely, lovely dress watch from Seiko. Don't matter to me that the watch tends to be on the thick side. Uses the 7S26 movement and therefore no hacking and cannot be hand wound. But who cares! Just buy a watch winder; problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: James KCH

customer_reviews.title: This is my absolute favorite watch right now
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite watch right now. The only oddity is that pulling the crown completely out to change the time does not halt the second hand. The manual included with the watch does not suggest that this is the intended response but I will look more into it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew P.

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't lucky with that one
customer_reviews.text: I loved that watch for how it looks: gorgeous green dial, classy style and leather band, but that's about it. Started the refund process because : 1. Watch doesn't work properly. After following all the instructions on how to wind it, it still was stopping every 15-40 seconds. 2. The movement is made in Malaysia. I have a nice time piece - SEIKO presage (the movement is Japanese) and the difference is very obvious. 3. Spanish calendar mixed with English. I was expecting English only. I have no problem with Spanish, but that watch supposed to be the wedding present for my fiance, who loves watches and green.
customer_reviews.author: María

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch. It is pretty large and heavy. But it seems extremely well made.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful front... but also take a look at the back! You can see the mechanical workings of the watch because it has a clear back cover. Sooo cool! I’m an engineer so I love stuff like that. I used to take my watches apart as a little kid because I wanted to see what was inside... now I don’t have to! Also to one of the other questions... this is one of the sturdiest bands I’ve ever had on a watch. It would be tough to break it. I mean you’d really have to beat it up.
customer_reviews.author: wanda

customer_reviews.title: IT'S NOT GREEN
customer_reviews.text: I bought it based on the picture & many reviews citing the green dial. When it came out of the box, I thought Amazon had shipped the wrong item -- it looked completely black. After some experimentation, I found that in sunlight, if you hold the watch at the exactly correct angle, dark green glints can be discerned around the edge of the dial. However even in sunlight it does not look ANYTHING like the picture, where the entire dial is green. And in any artificial light it looks dead black. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: CClark

customer_reviews.title: Best watch I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This watch to start with keeps perfect time. It is very classy looking with the green dial. I'm never owned a watch this nice. It is very durable also, has nice weight to it. The automatic function works perfect. As you make hand movement, gestures etc it winds the watch. I've had no problems keeping the watch wound up. It's easy to set the day / date feature. The band is a very thick leather which will break in and be more durable but it's not going to break any time soon. I wear it to work every day and I've not had one problem. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy W. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Seiko. And comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous emerald green face with gold accents. The brown calf skin band matches perfectly and is very comfortable. Probably my favorite Seiko in my collection. 4 starts on water resistance only because I'm reluctant to call it perfect because I haven't actually worn it in water and cannot give it a fair assessment. It claims to be resistant to "5 bars", so we'll have to trust that is accurate. Highly recommend this watch.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyDTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great look and great value!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about the watch except the self-winding. My husband could not keep it running from one day to the next. I’m guessing 8 hrs is the max it will run before needing arm movement to keep it going. Once going it keeps perfect time. I had to return it for that reason but if you have a short sleep time routine I’m sure you’d love it. The look is great! We loved the green face and high quality brown leather band. I thought it was super sexy on my husband. We wish we could get the same watch with an automatic wind mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce B.

customer_reviews.title: To big for my taste and the straps no good either
customer_reviews.text: Good looking thing but it just wears to large. It's about the lug to lug size. The band is pretty crap too being way to large at 22mm with no taper and stiff as a board. Replaced it with a stainless bracelet with a clasp and it sits much better. Still a little to big if you ask me. Hope and wishing the big watch trend will die. I would also say I would have liked to see more retro style in this design to. I know they were trying to bridge the gap but I think they fell a little short.
customer_reviews.author: Jarvas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is easy to read with its black face and large hour spots. I like that the day and date are larger the most and easy to read. I like that it is an elegant piece of jewelry. I like that it is an accurate timepiece. I don't like that if I leave it on the dresser for a couple of days I have to reset it because the spring ran down. After a few weeks I still like the watch, it's durable and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking watch
customer_reviews.text: I really like this watch. It is very nice looking and I like that it is an automatic watch with no battery to go dead. However it does have a tendency to lose time if I leave it in my watch winder for an extended period, even at 900 turns per day. I think that may be a problem with automatic watches in general. My Bulova watch loses time as well. No problem when I wear it though. I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: A good looking good watch
customer_reviews.text: It is really hard to go wrong with Seiko. They are solid watches well priced. I was drawn to this particular model because to me it is just a beautiful piece. Gold and green are highly complementary and I like the dial design and square case.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Clay

customer_reviews.title: Great watch but only buy under 150 it is using a old s7 system would be better if 4r
customer_reviews.text: It feels great but its band is mediocre , I would suggest getting a new band it is also very difficult to set up the time accurately since the seconds can not be stopped you have to time it. For the day and day of month has a Spanish option which is cool
customer_reviews.author: Why Me

customer_reviews.title: Great watch! Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous watch! Pictures don't do it justice. The green dial, the gold accents and the thick leather band really come together to create a beautiful and sophisticated looking timepiece. Really a great watch for the money. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: DavidD8912

customer_reviews.title: Everyone likes this watch.
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful. The green is amazing. I cannot stop looking at this watch. It shines under the light. BUT... don't expect to be perfect at measuring time. It's automatic and the movement is not one of the best made from Seiko so you have to expect it loses/gains around 10/15 seconds per day which means in a week it might be earlier/later of more than 1/2 minutes, that means 4/8 minutes per month. We all have a smartphone in our pockets if we want to know a perfect time. I spend a minute every Sunday morning to adjust the time and I really don't mind at all. I'll buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Used watch sold as new
customer_reviews.text: The watch itself is beautiful. But I was unimpressed with receiving a watch that had clearly born worn for a while. Had pen marks on the band. Was missing the instruction manual. Had hand writing on the warranty manual. Misrepresentation by the reseller.
customer_reviews.author: JDinSeattle

customer_reviews.title: Recraft automatic is a fabulous value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the watch for the retro-look, but I am amazed at the quality, especially for the price! It is a solid piece of machinery, works perfectly and has a good power reserve. Hard to believe a watch this good can be had at this price!
customer_reviews.author: Marc Attinasi

customer_reviews.title: Classic square design and striking green face!
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful green square throwback watch from Seiko. Substantial watch with nice, sturdy leather band. The green is a striking emerald green color in the sunlight. What a fabulous addition to my watch collection!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking watch with a few flaws
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch but later returned it. I read reviews after the purchase that indicated it was not accurate enough for me. There is no hacking ability but turning the knob in reverse while setting will pause the watch. The strap is very thick and it was very hard to buckle and unbuckle it.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M

customer_reviews.title: Self-winding  keep wrist moving!
customer_reviews.text: Fine looking watch but original description was a solar watch. Mistaken product description. Don't care for self-winding. Leave it overnight and probably has stopped. Not sure where the confusion originated.
customer_reviews.author: jim arcand

customer_reviews.title: Seiko Men's Recraft Series Automatic Leather Casual Watch (Model: SNKP27)
customer_reviews.text: Seiko Men's Recraft Series Automatic Leather Casual Watch (Model: SNKP27) Very nice. Unique/Not common shape and beautiful dial color with Seiko reliable movement.
customer_reviews.author: PP

customer_reviews.title: attractive watch
customer_reviews.text: It is really a nice looking watch with nice finishing and solid value. The leather strap is a bit thick but It will become more pliable with time. I waited a while to buy this one and that was wasted time.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Time Piece
customer_reviews.text: The quality and appearance is simply beautiful. The color contrast with the rough brown leather, silver body, gold hands and gorgeous green face is so unique and eye catching. My new favorite, even over my antique Omega.
customer_reviews.author: Willeyez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and beautiful watch, no regret at all for this purchase and the price paid for it. In the sunlight looks spectacular and there’s no need for a new strap, I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: I agree with other good reviews on look an feel, when it comes to power reserve am still watching if it can still stay for 40 hours, Apart it’s value for every buck.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The green, gold, and brown all pair well together. Sharp looking retro style. Pairs well with a Pendleton, or you can go even dressier ,and it looks good with a more formal shirt as well.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Handsome watch!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love how it looks! Good workmanship and the size is perfect. I can't comment yet on accuracy and water resistance but water resistance is written on the watch. Seiko is solid.
customer_reviews.author: Yoy

customer_reviews.title: Smart looking gents wristlet watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch from Amazon USA for over £110 cheaper than it is here in the UK.The watch arrived quickly and I had a quick check that it was all present and correct. I am more than happy to report it looks great and there appears to be no problem with it. It has been put away by my good lady wife and I will be receiving it as my main present for the forthcoming festivus celebrations. Many thanks from poor old Blighty
customer_reviews.author: Jim Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Nice retro look
customer_reviews.text: I like this Seiko a lot. The retro style is quite refreshing compared to my other watches. The weight is just perfect - not too light, not too heavy. The green dial matches the brown leather strap.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Barreiro

customer_reviews.title: I agree,  It’s nice.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch for the money. The green face will look great with my Fall wardrobe. Did not realize Automatic watches need to be continuously worn. Kind of a pain to setup every time you wear it. Looks make up for it.
customer_reviews.author: Louie S.

customer_reviews.title: doesn’t hand wind
customer_reviews.text: beautiful watch, but it does NOT hand wind so it loses one star, maybe everyone else knew this but i overlooked that detail
customer_reviews.author: stefan a karl

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful timepiece; the colors are magnificent! The leather band is soft and it lays on your wrist perfectly. It is a mechanical so you’ll have to wear it for it to work properly but that’s fine with me. It’s probably a little too expensive; should probably have been no more than $100. Just my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S. Hutto

customer_reviews.title: Unmatched beauty for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just an incredible timepiece for the price. I'm not sure it can be beat. Looks amazing indoors but, by god, when it hits that sunlight? Gorgeous. The way it glints and shines, to the way the sun slightly tints the dial is worth every penny. I did change the strap to a color I think makes the watch pop even more. Get this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Lorentzen

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous time peace
customer_reviews.text: Looks like its worth more than price... very classy and elegant. Gorgeous time peace.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Arhin

customer_reviews.title: Great watch at a Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great watch at a Great price. You'll probably make money on this one if you wait a few years. Yes, you can wear it in the meantime, and you'll want to because it's cool AF. Thanks Amazon!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cox, NYC

customer_reviews.title: What’s a watch for???
customer_reviews.text: It keeps lousy time. It loses almost a minute a day on an automatic winder. It cannot be worn at night. It will stop. When I get some time to focus it will go to a jeweler for a possible adjustment. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Peter B. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: This watch wears big
customer_reviews.text: The watch is beautiful. If you have a smaller wrist you may not like it.
customer_reviews.author: NMartin

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch , good quality for the money, hard to beat seiko : )
customer_reviews.author: clipper edwards

customer_reviews.title: Quality, style, afgirdability
customer_reviews.text: First watch I’ve purchased sense I bought a cell phone years ago. I love the ‘instant’ convenience of knowing the time etc. the jewelry aspect is again wonderful for making myself feel ‘successful’ in a way only quality jewelry and accessories are able to accomplish. Thus Seiko is the first of others in the near future. Quality, style and affordability.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L. Eutsler

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great looking watch
customer_reviews.text: The strap that comes with the watch is a lot better than the reviews had me believe. I actually bought a new strap for the watch and although it's an awesome strap that I bought 3rd party, I kept the original on there because it really completes the look of the piece for me. Amazing watch for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: High quality and precision feel.
customer_reviews.text: A great entry-level automatic. Looks great, the glass has a nice cut look to it, and the second hand has that quality smooth movement you look for in an automatic. The leather strap is high quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Big Mac

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son ,25,for his birthday . He selected it and really likes it!
customer_reviews.author: theresa brown

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great watch for the price. Husband likes that the leather band fits his small wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Houston

customer_reviews.title: Get it !
customer_reviews.text: Words cannot describe how much I love this watch. It is so stunning, I may never take it off...
customer_reviews.author: BDLOPEZ

customer_reviews.title: Elegance
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful face, strap is nice and the back is simply beautiful
customer_reviews.author: World Traveller

customer_reviews.title: A perfect Father's Day gift for my husband
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! A perfect Father's Day gift for my husband. He loves it! This watch has a classic feel to it without being ordinary. The green-blue face is really special and makes it pop.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Looks 100x better in real
customer_reviews.text: It has a luxury feel, Classic with a modern look. Looks 100x better in real. I may buy again as a gift for my brother
customer_reviews.author: ARC

customer_reviews.title: Hard to set accurate time.
customer_reviews.text: Runs fast. Adds 20 seconds per week. Also the second does not stop to set the time. This is my design according to Seiko.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: A high quality, good looking  time piece. Could not be more pleased.
customer_reviews.text: An excellent, high quality Seiko solor watch. Very pleasing to the eye. I wear for any occasion.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Looks sharp
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the unique style and I can read day and date without my reading glasses
customer_reviews.author: Ronald S. Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great vintage style watch
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really good looking watch and it works well. Gave it as a gift and he absolutely loves it. It’s a good size and weight but not bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Feeney

customer_reviews.title: Just Wow!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Seiko... handsome watch at a good price. I enjoyed wearing it only problem is I keep on looking at it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Junglepig80

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: It uses a rather primitive movement but I thank that adds to its charm.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth A

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep accurate time.  Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The watch does not keep accurate time. Sometimes off as much as 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Rowlett

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for the price
customer_reviews.text: My hubby loves it, being into watches says I've made an excellent choice! In reality it looks even more beautiful than in the picture, when you receive it!. Amazing product for the money. I am also very very happy with the shopping/delivery experience, ordering to Turkey.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Runs very fast
customer_reviews.text: The watch gains time even within an hour. Will be 20 minutes ahead by end of day. Not a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jabba The Putt

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: I like the watch very much. It's not got the best clockwork there is, but it runs pretty acurate. The reserve is dependent on that you move it a lot, otherwise it stops during the night. It has the most beautiful design I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: Idar Haugnes

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn't live up to Seikos I've previously owned. Lost 45 seconds during first week. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Huber

customer_reviews.title: Great classic watch
customer_reviews.text: Solid, and while the movement is a tiny bit fast it isn't out of the ordinary. I don't get the 48 hours of battery hold advertised - more like 12-18 - because if I don't put it back on the morning after taking it off it stops. Other than that, fantastic watch!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Boylan

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: Pictures do not do this watch Justice. The green is so deep and accent's the gold on the dial beautifully. With a day-date and being an automatic this watch is a great deal for the price and Seiko quality.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch. Day of week can be set for ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. Day of week can be set for English or Spanish. Everytime I wear it I get compliments. This is a must-have item for every watch collector.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Great Value with the Price
customer_reviews.text: Does not plan to try it in the water. Great value with the price! Still love it.
customer_reviews.author: xiao y wang

customer_reviews.title: Decent purchase
customer_reviews.text: The watch arrived well-packaged. However, the watch head and strap buckle were not wrapped in protective film. Although sold as 'new', some fine scratches could be seen. Beautiful watch nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Yipeng

customer_reviews.title: Wrist band, below expectations
customer_reviews.text: Watch band needs to match the Quality of the Brand name. Upgrade the Band
customer_reviews.author: N berbawy

customer_reviews.title: . I see it more as a watch for the businessman.
customer_reviews.text: This Watch was just a little too thick for my style of dress.
customer_reviews.author: Roger D. Spires

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn a watch daily for a few years, but this one has me getting back in the habit.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H.

customer_reviews.title: keeps excellent time and gorgeous face
customer_reviews.text: This watch is well crafted, keeps excellent time and gorgeous face. The band is robust but supple enough out of the box. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: David Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch
customer_reviews.text: I have received several compliments on the looks of this watch. Fairly accurate for an automatic watch, but I have had to adjust it by a minute or two every few days.
customer_reviews.author: William D. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic looking watch the strap suits it. I have read reviews where people dont like the strap to me its fine. The face of this watch looks stunning. Amazon shipped very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Stunning in Person
customer_reviews.text: The SNKP27 looks great in person. An automatic watch with a beautiful dial, day date function, and an exhibition case back all for $140 makes this watch a fantastic deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shake it for ticking
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Simple and to the point. Pictures don’t do it justice.
customer_reviews.author: Guljed Birce

customer_reviews.title: Automatic feature
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working within 1 week - automatic (movement) feature stopped working even with my regulat movement
customer_reviews.author: Michael King

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking watch. I use it every day... It has been keeping time with excellent precision.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff G.

customer_reviews.title: Just stunning!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch quick delivery. There might be a small defect, will post again if so
customer_reviews.author: LEKKAS KONSTANTINOS

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Seiko Automatic Dress Watch!
customer_reviews.text: What a watch! I loved the simple yet formal look.. and that tasty Green Dial! Wow! Just wow.. Also, its value for money! Loved this purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: dGee

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, feels great and looks even better. A weighty watch with the comfort of a leather strap
customer_reviews.author: Scott Conrad

customer_reviews.title: good protection
customer_reviews.text: since this is self wind the watch will stop running
customer_reviews.author: richard a larsen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: IT is even nicer that I expected. Instructions a little vague as to setting month and day,
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Cottle

customer_reviews.title: Sweet deal.
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. As advertised. Can’t go wrong at this price. High quality. Looks great. Keeps better time than my two Rolexes.
customer_reviews.author: tonyjude122

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch so much and will be a good gift for Birthday. Easy to figure out how to adjust it without much help from manual.
customer_reviews.author: WiTay

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it and gets so many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA PETERS

customer_reviews.title: Made in Malaysia
customer_reviews.text: Looks and quality for the price is the highlight Much nicer than the pictures capture
customer_reviews.author: Ravi Maharaj

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful Watch!!
customer_reviews.text: The watch is very beautiful... all the rest... the time will say...
customer_reviews.author: Reinaldo Roth Filho

customer_reviews.title: its look very stylish...
customer_reviews.text: I like the design very much .worth the money ..
customer_reviews.author: Gurung Krishna Bahadur

customer_reviews.title: quality and style
customer_reviews.text: love the quality and has a beautiful style that meets most of my outing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: a great piece to be added in my collection. glad that i bought it.
customer_reviews.author: MZR Salehin

customer_reviews.title: Great daily watch
customer_reviews.text: Another great watch from Seiko. This is my daily since I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, cheap movement
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t crown wind, doesn’t hack. Looks nice but an outdated cheap movement
customer_reviews.author: N C Anderson

product_meta.title: Seiko Men's Recraft Series Automatic Leather Casual Watch (Model: SNKP27)
product_meta.description:
Seiko RECRAFT Series Automatic. This sophisticated men's watch is designed with a rectangular stainless steel case and brown leather strap, featuring a teal dial and day/date calendar with see-through case back. Automatic movement allows self and automatic winding capabilities and features 21,600 vibrations per hour, with a power reserve of approximately 41 hours, as well as 21 jewels. 50M Water Resistant
